original_title: Tong Tong und die Rache der Faustgiganten
overview: Master Fu instructs his student Tong Tong to hunt down the outcast villain Power Chow. Power Chow is using his abilities to wipe out several lives across the country. Tong Tong is initially reluctant to use deadly powers himself, but once he sets out on his journey and makes acquaintance with Power Chow's creatures of the night in the Ghost Forest, nothing can stop him!
title: Tong Tong und die Rache der Faustgiganten
